title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi

lines.text: there's still 30 pallets of cannon shells in C bunker.
Forget the ammunition, there's no time.
Just get everyone on the transport.
We've caught them in the middle of their evacuation.
I have my orders from Supreme Leader Snoke himself.
This is where we snuff-out the resistance once and for all.
Tell Captain Canady to prime his dreadnought.
Incenerate their base, destroy their transports and obliterate their fleet.
Happy beeps here, buddy, come on.
We've pulled crazier stunts than this.
Just for the record, Commander Dameron, I'm with the droid on this one.
Thank you for your support, General.
This is Commander Poe Dameron of the Republic fleet, I have an urgent communique for General Hux.
This is General Hux of the First Order.
The Republic is no more. your fleet are rebel scum and war criminals Tell your precious princess there will be no terms... there will be no surrender.
Hi, I'm holding for General Hux.
You and your friends are doomed!
We will wipe your filth from the galaxy.
Can you- can he hear me?
Tell him Leia has an urgent message for him.
I believe he's tooling with you, sir.
All right, taking out the cannons now.
Captain Canady, why aren't you blasting that puny ship?
That 'puny ship' is too small and at close range.
We need to scramble our fighters!
He's not trying to penetrate our armor.
He's clearing out our surface cannons.
BB-8, my weapon systems are down.
We gotta take out that last cannon... or our bombers are toast.
The last transport is in the air, the evacuation is complete.
Now get your squad back here so we can get out of this place.
a chance to take down a dreadnought.
We can't let it get away.
Wipe that nervous expression off your face, 3PO.
It's not every day we get a shot at a dreadnought, so make this count.
If you get us there, we'll give it to them.
Tallie, they have targeted the fleet... begin the priming sequence.
I've got a visual on the target.
We are approaching the point of attack.
Why aren't your bay doors open?
General, Supreme Leader Snoke... is making contact from the ship.
I'll take it in my chambers.
Supreme leade- My disappointment... in your performance can not be overstated.
They can't get away, Supreme Leader.
We have them tied on the end of a string.
It's so good to see you.
We need to get you dressed.
You must have a thousand questions.
Chewie, what are you doing here?
He said you're coming back with us.
Long story we'll tell you in the Falcon.
Tied to a string, indeed, General Hux.
The Resistance will soon be in our grasp.
Do you wonder why I keep a rabid cur...
In a such a place of power?
I saw what all masters live to see.
And beyond that, something truly special.
I've given everything I have to you To the dark side.
You have too much of your father's heart in you, young Solo.
When the moment came I didn't hesitate.
And look at you, the deed split your spirit to the bone.
Bested by a girl who had never held a lightsaber!
The seed of the Jedi Order lives.
I thought you would be the one to snuff it out.
You're just a child... in a mask Prepare my ship.
There is no light left in Kylo Ren.
The First Order will control all the major systems within weeks.
We need the Jedi Order back.
Did you hear a word I just said?
I'm gonna walk out with a laser sword and face down the whole First Order?
What did you think was going to happen here?
Do you think that I came...
To the most unfindable place in the galaxy for no reason at all?
built a thousand generations ago... to keep these.
Just like me, they're the last of the Jedi religion.
Alright, that is pretty much nowhere Why are you here, Rey, from nowhere?
The first Order has become unstoppable.
Something inside me has always been there Then now it's awake.
I do not know what it is... or what to do with it.
I will never train another generation of Jedi.
I came to this island to die.
It's time for the Jedi to end.
Leia sent me here with hope.
If she was wrong, she deserves to know why.
If you start an attack, you follow through.
Poe, get your head out of your cockpit.
There are things you can not solve...
By jumping into an X-wing and blowing something up!
I need you to learn that.
There were heroes on that mission.
How's Rey going to find us now?
Alright, Well, until she comes back, what's the plan?
We need to find a new base.
One with enough power to get a distress signal to our allies.
w's Rey going to find us now?
Alright, Well, until she comes back, what's the plan?
We need to find a new base.
One with enough power to get a distress signal to our allies.
We have enough fuel for just one jump.
We have to get out of here.
So if we jump to lightspeed... they'll just find us again, and we'll be out of fuel.
Permission to jump in an X-wing and blow something up?
Follow my lead Green squadron to launch position.
Jump in and fire her up!
Technicians, secure supplies for launch conditions.
We have to get away from the Star Destroyers.
Get out of range of the Star Destroyers and the figthers will fall back.
Ren, the Resistance have pulled out of reach.
We can't cover you at this distance.
What is the point of all this?
We can't blow up three tiny cruisers?
They are faster and lighter, sir.
They can't lose us but they can keep at a range where... that our cannons are not effective against their shields.
Let's at least let's remind them that we're still here.
They won't last long burning fuel like this.
It's just a matter of time.
Her vital signs are weak, but she is fighting.
Hey, it's a sacred island, watch the language.
I wish I could make you understand.
Nothing can make me change my mind.
Years ago, you served my father in the Clone Wars. Now he begs you to help him in his struggle against the Empire.
It hurts me not to be able to fulfill my father's request in person...
But they are attacking my ship... and I fear that my mission to bring you to Alderaan failed.
It is our most desperate hour.
Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You're my only hope.
I will teach you the ways of the Jedi... and why they need to end.
This is the only good news I have.
Admiral Ackbar... all our leadership, they're gone.
Leia was the sole survivor on the bridge.
If she were here, she'd say save your sorrow for after the fight.
The chain of command is clear as to who should take her place.
Vice Admiral Holdo... of the cruiser Ninka.
There are four hundred of us... on three ships.
We're the very last of the Resistance But we're not alone.
In every corner of the galaxy... the downtrodden and oppressed know our symbol... and they put their hope in it.
We are the spark that will ignite the fire that will restore the Republic.
That spark... this Resistance, must survive.
And may the Force be with us.
Battle of Chyron Belt, Admiral Holdo?
With our current fuel consumption... there is a very limited amount time...
That we will stay out of range of those Star Destroyers.
Very kind to make me aware.
And we need to shake them before we find a new base, so...
Wasn't it Leia's last official act to demote you?
Where we lost our entire bombing fleet?
"Captain." "Commander." You can call me whatever you like.
I just want to know what's going on.
I've dealt with plenty of trigger happy flyboys like you...
And the last thing we need right now.
So stick to your post... and follow my orders.
Turbo-lifts seven and eight disconnected for maintenance.
I work behind pipes all day.
- Yes Yeah, look I'm not a Resistance hero, but...
It was nice talking to you, Rose.
May the Force be with you.
You left the First Order-what you did on the Starkiller Base.
When we heard about it, my sister Paige said...
"Rose, that's a real hero." "Know right from wrong....
"and don't run away from when it gets hard," she said.
Just this morning, I had to stun... three people who were trying to jump ship.
I gotta get back to what I was doing, so.
While boarding one... with a packed bag.
I'm taking you to the bridge and turning you in for desertion.
If my friend comes back to it, she's doomed too.
I've gotta get this beacon very far away from here, then she'll find me and be safe.
We cannot outrun the First Order fleets.
We can jump to light speed Well they can track us through lightspeed.
- They can track us through lightspeed?
They'll just show up 30 seconds later and we'll have blown a ton of fuel.
Of which, by the way, we're dangerously short of.
- They can track us through lightspeed.
What did you shoot me with?
Hyperspace tracking is a new tactic but the principal must be the same as any active tracker.
But we can't get to the tracker.
It is an A class process they'll control from the main bridge.
Yes, but all Class A process...
- Has a dedicated power breaker - Power breaker.
Who knows where the breaker room is on the Star Destroyer?
I'm the guy who used to mop it.
If I can get us there I can shut their tracker down.
Just give it to me one more time, but simpler.
So the First Order's only tracking us from one Destroyer, the main one.
So we make blow that one up?
I like where you're heading, but no.
They'd only start tracking us from another Destroyer.
If we sneak onboard into the main Destroyer and we turn off the tracker without them realizing, then we can...
They won't realize if it's for one system cycle.
Disable the tracker Our fleet escapes before they even realize.
Poe, we've got to do this It will save the fleet and it'll save Rey.
If I surely must be the voice of reason...
Admiral Holdo will never agree to this plan.
It's a need to know plan, and she doesn't.
You guys shut down that tracker.
I'll be here to jump us to lightspeed.
How do we sneak the two of you onto Snoke's destroyer?
No, they are Bio-Hexaencripted and rescrambled every hour.
We can't get through their security shields undetected.
Of course I could do it.
But I can't do it, I'm a little tied down right now.
A union dispute, you do NO want to hear about it.
There's exactly one guy I trust that can crush that kind of security.
He is a master code breaker, an ace pilot... a poet with a blaster.
could do it. But I can't do it, I'm a little tied down right now.

A union dispute, you do NO want to hear about it. But, lucky for you... There's exactly one guy I trust that can crush that kind of security. He is a master code breaker, an ace pilot... a poet with a blaster.
It seems that this code breaker can practically do everything.
Oh yes, he can. You will find him with a red ploom flower on his lapel... rolling on a high stakes table... in the casino... on Canto Bight.
Maz... Is there any way we can take care of this ourselves?
I'm sorry, kiddo. This is rarified cracking. If you want to get on that Destroyer, I know only one option. Find the master code breaker.
You will bring Luke Skywalker to me.
You are not doing this, the effort would kill you.
You are going to pay for what you did!
I can't see yours. Just you. So no. This is something else.
I was cleaning my blaster-it went off. Let's get started.
Caretakers. Island natives. They've kept up the Jedi structures since they've been built.
I don't think they like me.
Master Skywalker... We need you to bring the Jedi back... because Kylo Ren is strong with the dark side of the Force. Without the Jedi, we won't stand a chance against him.
What do you know about the Force?
It's a power the Jedi have that lets them control people and... make things float.

Impressive Every word in that sentence was wrong. Lesson one... Sit here, legs crossed. The Force is not a power you have. It's not about lifting rocks. It's the energy between all things. a tension, a balance... that binds the universe together.
Close your eyes. Breathe. Now... reach out.
Really? Wow, it must be very strong with you. I've never felt anything... Aw!
You said to reach out tho... I'll try again. Breathe. Just breathe. Reach out with your feelings. What do you see?
The island. Life. Death and decay... that feeds the new life. Warm. Cold. Peace. Violence. And between it all?
Balance. And energy... A force. And inside you?

Inside me... the same Force. And this is the lesson. That Force does not belong to the Jedi. To say that if the Jedi die, the light dies, it's vanity. Can you feel that? There's something else... benathe the island. A place. A dark place.
Balance. Powerful light, powerful darkness. It's cold. It's calling me. Resist it, Rey.

You went straight to the dark. That place was trying to show me something. It offered you something you needed. And you didn't even try to stop yourself. But I didn't see you. Nothing from you. You closed yourself off from the Force. Of course you have. I've seen this raw strength only once before... in Ben Solo. It didn't scare me enough then. It does now.
The fleet's only got 18 hours of fuel left. We gotta hurry.
Still comming to the Resistance? Keep at it. If you reach them, check their status. And ask about Finn.
Why is the Force connecting us? You and I.
Murderous snake. You're too late. You lost. I found Skywalker.
Did he tell you what happened? The night I destroyed his temple, did he tell you why?
I know everything I need about you.
You do? Ah, you do. You have that look in your eyes. From the forest. When you call me a monster.
Okay, we get in, find this code breaker and get out. Do you know this town?
Canto Bight? From stories. It's a terrible place full of the worst people in the galaxy.
I told those two... I said, "This is a public beach, you can't park that shuttle" But they just went off toward the casino.
Place your bets. All the bets on the table, right now! Place your bets here.
Oh, yes! This place is great!
Okay. Maz says that this master decoder would have a red ploom on his lapel. Let's find him and get out of here.
Rather, where are your manners old man?
We toured the entire casino. Zero ploom flower. Where is this guy?
Are those what I think they are?
Fathiers. I've never seen a real one. This whole place is beautiful.
Come on. Why do you hate it so much?

Look closer. My sister and I grew up in a poor mining system. The First Order stripped our ore to finance its military... then shelled us to test their weapons. They took everything we had. And who do you think these people are? There is only one business in the galaxy that'll get you this rich. War. Selling weapons to the First Order. I wish... I could put my fist through this whole lousy beautiful town.
A red ploom flower! A red ploom flower! The master code breaker!
Eeyup, those are the shore parkers. Alright, You are arrested for parking violation 27B / 6.
No no. Not now, lovely. I'm on a roll.
Lesson two. Now that they are extinct, the Jedi are romanticized, deified But if you strip away the myth and look a their deeds the legacy of the Jedi is failure. Hypocrisy, hubris.
At the height of their power, they allowed Darth Sidious to rise... Create the Empire and wipe them out. It was a Jedi Master whose responsible... for the training and creation of Darth Vader.
And the Jedi who saved him.

Yes, the most hated man in the galaxy. But you saw that there was conflict inside him. You believed that he wasn't gone, that he could be turned. And I became a legend. For many years, there was balance... and then I saw... Ben. My nephew... with that mighty Skywalker blood. In my hubris... I thought I could train him, that I could pass on my strength. Han wasn't fond about it, but... Leia... trusted me with her son. I took him... and a dozen students... and began a training temple. By the time I realized I was no match for the darkness rising in him... It was too late.

I went to confront him. And he turned on me. Ben, no! He must have thought I was dead. When I came to... the temple was burning. He had vanished with a handful of my students. And slaughtered the rest. Leia blamed Snoke, but... It was me. I failed. Because I was Luke Skywalker. Jedi master. A legend.
The galaxy may need a legend. I need someone to show me my place in all this. And you didn't fail Kylo. Kylo failed you. I won't.
The main cruiser's still keeping beyond range. But his medical frigate is out of fuel... And it's shields are down. The beginning their end. Destroy it.
The last of our crew has been evacuated and heading your way. It's been an honor, admiral.
Admiral... fuel reserves at six hours. Maintain our current course. Steady on.
Finn, the fleet is running on fumes. Without a code breaker to sneak into Snoke's Star Destroyer...
I don't know. If you don't have a thief in your pocket, then our plan is shot.

What? Sorry, I'm just... I couldn't help but overhear the stuff you were saying really loudly... while I trying to sleep. Code breaker? Thief? I can do it. I'm not talking about picking pockets, okay? Aw, yeah. Don't let the wrapper fool you, friend... Me and the First Order codage, go way back. If the price is right... I could break you into Old Man Snoke's budoire.
Yeah. We gotta get outta here! This way!
Yeah, man. What's your story, roundy?
They went this way! Lock down all the exits.
Yeah, smells great. Those cops will be here any minute. What now?
No wait, please stop! We're with the Resistance.
Here. They must have come through here. Go, go, go, go, go!
Stop enjoying this, stop enjoying this!
We've got them. They aren't going anywhere.
Move! Get out of the way!
Our ship is on the beach straight ahead! We need cover!
Stop enjoying this, stop enjoying this!
Our ship is on the beach straight ahead!
Wait, are you flying that thing?
Oh, do you need a lift?
I'd rather not do this now.
Why did you hate your father?
A cowl or something you can put on?
Why did you hate your father?
You had a father who loved you... who gave a **** about you.
Your parents threw you like garbage.
But you can't stop needing them.
You're looking for them everywhere... in Han Solo... now in Skywalker.
Did he tell you what happened that night?
He sensed my power... as he senses yours.
Kill it if you have to.
It's the only way to become what you're meant to be.
I should have felt trapped or frightened.
It didn't go on forever, I knew it was leading somewhere.
And that at the end it would show me what I came to see.
I thought I'd find answers here.
I've never felt so alone You're not alone.
Did you try to murder him?
I'd sensed it building in him.
I'd see it at moments during his training.
But then I looked inside... and it was beyond what I ever imagined.
Snoke had already turned his heart.
He would bring destruction, and pain, and death... and the end of everything I love because of what he will become.
And for the briefest moment of pure instinct...
I thought I could stop it.
It passed like a fleeting shadow.
And I was left with shame... and with consequence.
And the last thing I saw... were the eyes of a frightened boy whose master had failed him.
You failed him by thinking his choice was made It wasn't There is still conflict in him If he turned from the dark side, that could shift the tide.
This could be how we win.
This is not going to go the way you think.
Just now, when we touched hands...
As solid as I'm seeing you.
If I go to him, Ben Solo will turn.
Then he is our last hope.
The tree, the text, the Jedi.
I'm going to burn it down.
So it is time... that the Jedi are to end.
For you to look at a pile of old books...
but that library contains nothing that the girl Rey does... not already possess.
I can't be what she needs me to be.
Heeded my words not, did you?
Pass on what you have learned.
Luke... we are what they grow beyond.
That is the true burden of all masters.
Four parsecs to go, this thing really clicks I hope we are still on time.
You can actually do this, right?
But there exists a previous conversation about price.
Once we're done, the Resistance will give you whatever you want.
Look at us Is that Haysian smelt?
No, we gave you our word.
We are going to get paid.
Guys, I want to keep helping.
Okay, listen here... you gotta- Do it.
You have no idea what that medallion means to her.
Why are you ransacking your own ship?
At least you're stealing from the bad guys... and helping the good.
Let's see who formally owns this gorgeous hunk.
This guy was an arms dealer.
Made his bank selling weapons to the bad guys.
Finn, let me learn you something big.
That was the last of their support ships.
It's just their main cruiser now.
Well, according to our calculations... critical.
Yeah, she forbade you to be on the bridge.
Captain you're not allowed in here.
We had a fleet, now we're down to one ship and you've told us nothing!
Tell us we that have a plan!
She would say that hope is like the sun.
If you only believe in it when you can see it- You'll never make it through the night.
Are you filling up the transports?
That's what you brought us to?
Those transports ships are unarmed, unshielded.
If we abandon this cruiser, we're done.
No, you are not just a coward...
Get this man off my bridge.
Finn, Holdo filling the crew to the shuttles.
Poe, we're on our way back to the fleet.
Did you find the master code breaker?
We can shut the tracker down, just buy us a little more time.
As soon as I launch you jump out of range.
Stay there until you get my signal where to rendevous.
If you see Finn before I do... tell him...
We should be off their scopes.
Then we make a slice a slit in their shield.
So a stormtrooper, and a who now are doing what?
They are trying to save us.
This is our best chance for escape.
You have to give Finn and Rose all the time that you can.
You have bet the survival of the Resistance... on bad odds and put us all at risk?
We have to get clear of the cruiser.
Yes, I was afraid you'd say that.
I am relieving you of your command... for that the survival of this ship, its crew and the Resistance.
I hope you understand what you're doing.
It is at least three cycles.
I will do my best, sir.
You don't have to do this.
I feel the conflict in you.
Just the shape of it, but solid and clear.
You will not bow before Snoke.
I saw something too Because of what I saw...
I know that when it comes, you will be the one to turn.
I saw who your parents are.
Well done, my good and faithful apprentice.
My faith in you, is restored.
The tracker is right behind this door?
Good time to figure out how to get back to the fleet.
I know where the nearest escape pods are.
Have the cruiser prep for lightspeed.
Good time to figure out how to get back to the fleet.
I know where the nearest escape pods are.
Have the cruiser prep for lightspeed.
Escort the officers down to the hangar.
Captain Dameron, Admiral Holdo was looking for you.
Sir, I am almost afraid to ask.
3PO, where do you think you're going?
It would be quite against my program...
- to be party to a mutiny - Hey!
We are ready to make the jump.
So good to have you back.
Approach transportation according to your evacuation designation.
Let me push them up, guys.
Now, time to board your transport.
For the transports to escape... someone needs to stay behind to pilot the cruiser.
- May the force be- You go on, I've already said it enough.
May the force be with you, always.
Cloaking device activated, we should drop and go.
Darkness rises... and light to meet it.
I warned my young apprentice... that as he grew stronger... his equal in the light would rise.
You underestimate Skywalker... and Ben Solo...
It was I who bridged your minds.
I knew he was not strong enough to hide it from you.
And you were not wise enough to resist the bait.
And now... you will give me Skywalker.
Then I will kill you... with the cruelist stroke.
An uncharted hideout from the days of the Rebellion.
Abandoned... but heavily armored... with enough power to get a distress signal to our allies.
Holdo knew the First Order... was tracking our big ship.
We could slip down to the surface unnoticed... and hide until the First Order passes.
She was more interested in protecting the light than she was... seeming like a hero.
Your ship and payment, as we agreed.
We got caught, I c-cut a deal.
Sir, we checked on the information from the thief.
We ran a de-cloaking scan, and sure enough...
30 Resistance transports have just launched from the cruiser.
Full speed to planet, move... full speed!
I did not expect Skywalker to be so wise.
We will give him and the Jedi Order... the death he desires.
After the Rebels are gone, we will go to his planet... and obliterate the entire island.
The entire Resistance on those transports.
Soon they will all be gone.
Oh, still that fiery spit of hope.
You have the spirit of a true Jedi!
And because of that... you must die.
My worthy apprentice... son of darkness, heir apparent to Lord Vader.
Where there was conflict, I now sense resolve.
Complete your training... and fulfill your destiny.
I know what I have to do.
You think you can turn him? Pathetic child. I can not be betrayed... I can not be beaten. I see his mind... I see his every intent. Yes. I see him turning the lightsabre to strike true. And now...
Foolish child. He ignites it... And kill his true enemy!
Oh, t-take it easy, Big F.
They blow you up today, you blow them up tomorrow.
There is still time to save the fleet.
It's time to let old things die.
The Sith... the Jedi, the Rebels... let it all die.
I want you to join me.
We can rule together and bring a new order to the galaxy.
No, no you're still holding on!
Do you want to know the truth about your parents?
They were filthy junk traders... who sold you off for drinking money.
They're dead... in a poverished grave in the Jakku desert.
You have no place in this story.
You come from nothing you're nothing.
Sir... the Resistance cruiser's preparing to jump to lightspeed.
They're just trying to pull our attention away.
Keep your fire on the transports.
Execution by blaster is too good for them.
There's a shuttle back over there, we've gotta go!
You were a bug in the system.
Get all our forces to that Resistance base.
Who do you think you're talking to?
You presumed to command my army?
I'm so glad to see you!
All our shields are up, so they can't hit us from orbit.
Use whatever power we've got left... to broadcast a distress signal to the Outer Rim.
If there's any allies to the Resistance...
Rotted munitions, rusted artillery, and some half gutted skim speeders.
Let's just pray that big-**s door holds long enough for us to get help.
It will crack that door open like an egg.
There has to be a back way out of here, right?
This is the only way in, or out.
They'll get our message and they'll come.
But we have to buy time.
We gotta take out that cannon.
I don't like these rust buckets, and I don't like our odds, but- what the ****?
Just keep it tight... and don't get drawn in too close 'till they run that cannon up front.
Alright ground forces, lay down some fire!
Should we hold until we clear them?
The Resistance is in that mine.
We have to hold them 'till they pull out that cannon!
Rose, you've got three right behind you!
Blow that piece of junk, out of the sky!
Chewie, pull them out from the battle.
We have to hold them 'till they pull out that cannon!
Rose, you've got three right behind you!
Blow that piece of junk, out of the sky!
Chewie, pull them out from the battle.
Draw them away from the speeders.
She drew them off, all of them!
Our only shot is right down the throat.
The cannon's opening, this is our chance!
Concentrate all fire on the speeders!
They're picking us all off, we're not gonna make it.
Alright, I'll make my final approach.
Target in sight, guns are hot.
The cannon is charged, it's a suicide run!
That's how we're going to win.
Not fighting what we hate... but saving what we love.
Our distress signal has been received at multiple points... but no response.
They've heard us... but no one's coming.
But... the galaxy has lost all it's hope.
I know what you are going to say.
I'm just glad you're here... at the end.
I came to face him, Leia.
I held out hope for so long, but...
I know my son is gone.
I want every gun we have to fire on that man.
Do you think you got him?
Now, if we're ready to get moving... we can finish this.
Keep the door covered and don't advance until I say.
We should help him, let's go.
Did you come back to say you forgive me?
He's doing this for a reason.
He's stalling so we can escape.
It is one man against an army.
We have to help him, we have to fight.
We are the spark that will light the fire that will burn the First Order down.
Skywalker's doing this so we can survive.
There's gotta be a way out of this mine.
****, how did he get in here?
But sir, it is possible that a natural unmapped area exists.
But this installation is such a maze of endless tunnels... that the odds of finding an exit are 15,428...
My audio sensors no longer detect the...
Where did the crystal critters go?
What are you looking at me for?
The beacon's right below us, they have to be somewhere.
I will have killed the last Jedi.
Every word of what you just said... was wrong.
And I will not be THE LAST JEDI I'll destroy her... and you... and all of it.
